name: Lust of Mafia
description:
Black or White? Time to Conquer the Mafia World!
This is A CITY that full of power and beauty
This is A WORLD that full of building and war
Lust of Mafia is the Latest modern underworld interactive rpg simulation strategy mobile game
You can not only experience the promotion from a Mafia to the President strategically but also obtain the immersive and romantic dating experience with various secretaries
Plus, as the owner of the city, you can recruit more agents, explore the overseas area, invest in jewelry, and more

[GAME FEATURES]
▲Running City on the Sandbox Map▲
Zoom-in to manage your own city, using a large number of exquisite architectural models to make your city prosper.
▲Alliance System in the Underground World▲
Join or create the most powerful alliance, grabbing your partner and fight together against other alliance for assets.
▲Realistic Secretary System for Interacting with Different Beauties▲
Enjoy the interactive scenarios of exquisite pictures and sounds where you meet the ladies, date with them, and fall in love with them.
▲Recruiting & Upgrading the Strongest Agents▲
Arrange the best agents together, creating your unique and strongest army
▲Worldwide Trading System Make Your Rule International▲
Overseas properties that are added with special events that are updated weekly. You’ll need to explore every day in order to become to Godfather!
▲The Most Realistic Mafia Life▲
Collect luxury vehicles and golden, race cars, and experience various gambling, where you can experience all kinds of gameplay.

[LUST OF MAFIA GLOBAL GROUP]
Mission: Feedback in the official customer service Email: LustofMafia@hotmail.com
